additional_info: 1.2 - Removed some green outline from item images 1.1 - Made things more purple - Search dropdown is not white - some other stuff I probably 4got 1.0 - Changed logo a bit - Place Order button color changed to fit the "dark theme" - Some other small color stuffs that you wont notice but trigger my OCD
